content: a crochet pattern in french english and german to make 7 different leaves 2 maple leaves 3 birch leaves and 2 oak leaves each 5-8 cm high perfect as a fall decoration or as colorful coasters pdf tutorial with numerous step-by-step photos and a video difficulty level medium please note the purchase of this item is for a digital pdf crochet pattern not the finished toy in the photos the pdf pattern will be available for download immediately after payment you will receive an email from etsy with a link to download it this pattern is for personal use only it may not be copied or redistributed in any way you may sell the finished product made with this pattern by crediting me marie-jeanne fawer @mjfcrochet i would love to see your finished work and hear your feedback on social media please credit me as follows @mjfcrochet and #mjfcrochet thank you for respecting my work i hope you enjoy crocheting
